attributes.action: Instigate a new United Kingdoms of Europe uniting local countries and develop WW
attributes.additional_details: Scotland, England, Wales, Ireland - this is the starting point to identify those that wish to join a common market with shared powers; not the UK sovereignty but UKoE powers (or USE a la USA) Even the letters form the purpose; Use the market to trade; but first, we need to come together as local entities and stop the political rhetoric and more splits; we will only survive if we show the spirit and togetherness of our grandparents. It is a time to show how great we can be together. Now.
attributes.background: Why is there only one union in Europe? That is just how its been for 41 years;Europe extends far and many are not included; now is the time for entrepreneurial spirit; now is the time to remove the shackles and define a new reformed structure to reach out to the world
